Articles.Content:
I'm not sure where to post this so mods if this is in the wrong section just shove it there.

Would like to ask will there be any issues if I put my fan-fiction story up on a website apart from the forums? The only part(s) that's Kerbal is that the characters in the story are all Kerbals. As for illustrations I might include Kerbals in them. 

Thanks
Nope there's no restrictions on putting things about Kerbals on different sites (eg https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/)

5 hours ago, The Space Dino said:

What about my own website?

No restrictions so go ahead. The only thing to keep in mind is that if you are making a profit from this website (like if it has ads), then you won't be able to post links to it on this KSP forum per rule 2.2i (no "self promotional posts or that promote a 3rd party for profit, monetization other than optional donation (adf.ly etc) and advertising products or services without prior approval")

Don't know why they should even think about making the KSP community a secret organisation. I would be proud to tell im a KSP player and fan on the internet.

Edited August 26, 2017 by NSEP
